item.title: 五年内解决住房短缺问题的计划
item.description:
房利美和房地美能否加快多户住宅建设？【原文：

Can Fannie and Freddie accelerate multi-family construction?

】

item.title: 重要参议员为拜登提名的 FDIC 领导人选寻求快速通道
item.description: 一位位高权重的美国参议员希望加快漫长的确认程序，让克里斯蒂-戈德史密斯-罗梅罗（Christy Goldsmith Romero）获准担任陷入困境的联邦存款保险公司（Federal Deposit Insurance Corp）主席。【原文：A powerful US senator is looking to speed up the lengthy confirmation process to get Christy Goldsmith Romero approved as chair of the troubled Federal Deposit Insurance Corp.】

item.title: 尽管市场持怀疑态度，但对委内瑞拉过渡的赌注却出现了
item.description: 据巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）称，市场认为下周末的选举将在数十年来首次导致委内瑞拉政权更迭。【原文：Markets are overlooking odds that next weekend’s election ushers in regime change in Venezuela for the first time in decades, according to Barclays Plc.】

item.title: 据称中国三峡集团关注西班牙 Greenvolt 能源资产
item.description: 据知情人士透露，国有企业中国长江三峡集团公司（China Three Gorges Corp.【原文：State-owned China Three Gorges Corp. is in talks to buy a 170-megawatt renewable portfolio in Spain from Portuguese company Greenvolt-Energias Renovaveis SA, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 古根海姆分析师称 SunPower 股票毫无价值，股价暴跌
item.description: 由于古根海姆证券公司（Guggenheim Securities）将这家太阳能设备公司的目标股价下调至零，并称该公司股票可能很快退市，SunPower 公司股价周五暴跌 42%。【原文：SunPower Corp. shares plunged 42% on Friday as Guggenheim Securities cut the solar equipment firm’s price target to zero and said the stock may soon be delisted.】

item.title: KKR 成为收购 Instructure 的领跑者
item.description: 据知情人士透露，KKR & Co.已成为收购 Instructure Holdings Inc. 的领跑者，包括债务在内，这笔交易对这家教育软件供应商的估值约为 47 亿美元。【原文：KKR & Co. has emerged as the front-runner to acquire Instructure Holdings Inc., according to people with knowledge of the matter, in a deal that could value the education software provider at about $4.7 billion including debt.】

item.title: 华盛顿地区学院为吸引学生耗尽三分之一捐赠基金
item.description: 在华盛顿特区波托马克河（Potomac River）对岸，玛丽蒙特大学（Marymount University —）这所小型天主教大学正竭尽全力扭转财务状况。【原文：Across the Potomac River from Washington, DC, Marymount University — a small Catholic college — is doing everything it can to turn around its finances.】

item.title: 能源部门表现平平，信实集团利润不及预期
item.description: 亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）掌舵的信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）公布的利润不及分析师预期，原因是能源业务的低利润率超过了面向消费者的业务部门的增长。【原文：Reliance Industries Ltd., helmed by billionaire Mukesh Ambani, reported a profit that missed analyst expectations as low margins in energy businesses outweighed the growth posted by its consumer-facing units.】

item.title: 印度央行出售 4.06 亿美元印度债券，指数纳入刺激资金流动
item.description: 在截至7月14日的一周内，印度央行在二级市场上出售了340亿卢比（约合4.06亿美元）的债券，这很可能是为了清理银行系统中因国债被纳入全球指数后资金流入而引发的过剩现金。【原文：India’s central bank sold 34 billion rupees ($406 million) of bonds in the secondary market in the week ended July 14, as it likely stepped in to mop up excess cash in the banking system triggered by flows into the nation’s debt after they were included into a global index.】

item.title: 津巴布韦伊马拉称推动 ZiG 单一货币 "令人震惊和担忧
item.description: 津巴布韦最大的独立经纪公司表示，津巴布韦应该恢复其公民的信任，而不是建议他们被迫放弃美元。【原文：Zimbabwe should restore the trust of its citizens rather than suggest they be forced to abandon the dollar, according to the country’s largest independent brokerage.】

item.title: 肯尼亚总统在致命抗议后开始改革内阁
item.description: 肯尼亚总统威廉-鲁托（William Ruto）在致命的反政府抗议活动后解散了大部分政府成员，一周后开始任命新内阁。【原文：Kenyan President William Ruto began appointing a new cabinet, a week after dismissing most of his administration in the wake of deadly anti-government protests.】

item.title: 尼日利亚监管机构称丹格特寻求禁止柴油进口
item.description: 尼日利亚监管机构负责人表示，阿里科-丹格特（Aliko Dangote）已要求尼日利亚暂停进口柴油和航空燃料，此举将使他的炼油厂垄断柴油和航空燃料的销售。【原文：Aliko Dangote has asked Nigeria to suspend imports of diesel and aviation fuel in a move that would hand his refinery a monopoly on their sale, the head of the country’s regulatory agency said.】

item.title: 据说 KKR 正在酝酿收购生命科学公司 Biotage 股份的方案
item.description: 知情人士透露，KKR & Co.正在考虑出售其在瑞典生命科学公司Biotage AB的股份。【原文：KKR & Co. is considering a sale of its stake in Swedish life sciences firm Biotage AB, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 埃利奥特支持以每年 50 亿美元房地产贷款为目标的公司
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司与 Genesis Capital 前首席执行官罗伯特-瓦斯蒙德（Robert Wasmund）合作，建立了一个新的住宅开发贷款机构。【原文：Elliott Investment Management partnered with Robert Wasmund, the former chief executive officer of Genesis Capital, to build out a new lender for residential development.】

item.title: 摩根大通债券交易后印度储备激增约 100 亿美元
item.description: 在印度被摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：India’s foreign exchange reserves jumped sharply last week as investors bought the nation’s stocks and bonds following the country’s inclusion in the JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s emerging markets bond index.】

item.title: 尽管可可豆价格上涨，但可可需求仍有回升迹象，因此可可价格上涨
item.description: 可可期货连续第二天攀升，原因是在可可豆价格上涨和供应紧张的背景下，加工速度得以保持。【原文：Cocoa futures climbed for a second day as the pace of processing holds up against the backdrop of higher beans prices and a supply crunch.】

item.title: 吉利旗下吉客考虑在欧洲制造电动汽车以规避关税
item.description: 电动汽车制造商Zeekr正考虑在与其母公司--中国汽车集团浙江吉利控股集团有限公司--有关联的欧洲工厂生产汽车，以规避欧盟关税并进一步扩大其国际扩张。【原文：Electric vehicle maker Zeekr is considering making cars in European factories linked to its parent, the Chinese auto conglomerate Zhejiang Geely Holding Group Co., to avoid European Union tariffs and further its international expansion.】

item.title: 美银美林称投资者因特朗普胜选和美联储减息而买入美股
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）的策略师表示，随着投资者越来越确信美联储将于 9 月份减息以及唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将在美国总统大选中获胜，他们正纷纷涌向美国股市。【原文：Investors are flocking to US equities as they grow more certain of a September cut by the Federal Reserve and that Donald Trump will win the US presidential election, according to Bank of America Corp. strategists.】

item.title: 力拓锂业的耐心终于在塞尔维亚得到回报
item.description:
矿业公司为开放 Jadar site 所做的三年努力蕴含着如何让政府和公民站在一起的经验教训。【原文：

Miner’s three-year effort to open its Jadar site carries lessons about getting governments and citizens onside together.

】

item.title: 加密货币交易公司 Wintermute 正与腾讯及其他投资者洽谈融资事宜
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，加密货币交易公司 Wintermute Trading Ltd. 正在与包括腾讯控股有限公司在内的投资者洽谈融资事宜，估值约为 20 亿美元。【原文：Crypto trading firm Wintermute Trading Ltd. is in talks with investors including Tencent Holdings Ltd. to raise money at a valuation of roughly $2 billion, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 西方对俄罗斯油轮的挤压越来越紧：石油战略
item.description: 彭博石油策略师朱利安-李（Julian Lee）写道，又是一周，七国集团对在全球运输俄罗斯石油的油轮船队再次施压。【原文：Another week, another gentle turning up of the heat by Group of Seven nations on the fleet of tankers moving Russian petroleum around the world, writes Bloomberg oil strategist Julian Lee.】

item.title: SLB 和哈里伯顿看到国际油田需求强劲
item.description: SLB 和哈里伯顿公司是全球最大的两家油田服务供应商，它们在公布盈利达到或超过预期后表示，国际原油钻探需求强劲，支持它们进军海外市场。【原文：SLB and Halliburton Co., two of the world’s biggest oilfield service providers, said they see strong international demand for crude drilling after posting earnings that met or exceeded expectations, supporting their shift into overseas markets.】

item.title: 罗马老板弗里德金结束收购埃弗顿足球俱乐部的竞标
item.description: 罗马俱乐部（AS Roma）老板丹-弗里德金（Dan Friedkin）在与英超埃弗顿足球俱乐部（Everton FC）就收购其多数股权进行独家谈判近一个月后，不再继续执行收购陷入财务困境的埃弗顿俱乐部的计划。【原文：AS Roma owner Dan Friedkin won’t proceed with a plan to buy financially stricken Everton FC, almost a month after entering exclusive talks to acquire a majority stake in the Premier League football club.】

item.title: 南非将提出碳市场监管建议
item.description: 南非国家财政部计划在未来几个月内就如何监管该国的碳市场提出建议。【原文：South Africa’s National Treasury plans to lay out its proposals for how to regulate carbon markets in the country in the next few months.】

item.title: 法国小麦因供应担忧而上涨，而美国小麦则长势喜人
item.description: 巴黎小麦期货周五上涨，因为主要生产国报告收成缓慢，产量减少。【原文：Paris wheat futures advanced on Friday as major producing nations reported slow harvests and dwindling production.】

item.title: 在获得 60% 的回报后，套利交易者开始抛弃比索和雷亚尔
item.description: 随着政治因素将两位数的收益转化为亏损赌注，拉美正被取代，成为货币投资者的首选交易地。【原文：Latin America is being replaced as the go-to trade for currency investors as politics turns double-digit gains into losing bets.】

item.title: 乌克兰拘留 30 名挪用军队资金的官员
item.description: 乌克兰在全国范围内拘留了 30 名涉嫌挪用国家国防专项资金的官员，因为基辅正努力向西方捐助者保证它正在妥善使用援助。【原文：Ukraine detained 30 officials nationwide over alleged embezzlement of funds earmarked for the state’s defense, as Kyiv struggles to assure Western donors that it’s properly using assistance.】

item.title: 对冲基金制定了选举计划：卖出平静，买入混乱
item.description: 这个选举交易怎么样？现在就卖出获胜股票，这样今年秋天政治角逐白热化时，您手头就有现金，可以积极买入。【原文：How’s this for an election trade? Sell your winners now so you have cash on hand this fall to do some aggressive buying as the political jockeying heats up.】

item.title: 欧盟关系开始恶化，梅洛尼可能正在失去魔力
item.description: 乔治亚-梅洛尼开始发现自己被欧洲人拒之门外。但她不会就此罢休。【原文：Giorgia Meloni is starting to find herself shut out of the European conversation. And she’s not going down without a fight.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。在微软公司报告出现故障后，银行、航空公司和交易所都受到了干扰。美联储九月降息的希望越来越大。拜登总统面临前所未有的压力，要求他退出2024年大选。以下是您需要了解的信息— Morwenna Coniam【原文：Good morning. Banks, airlines and exchanges have been disrupted after Microsoft reported an outage. Hopes are growing the Fed will cut interest rates in September. And President Biden faces unprecedented pressure to drop out of the 2024 election race. Here’s what you need to know — Morwenna Coniam】
